questions.question: Which of the following is an example of a social enterprise?
Which of the following is an advantage of buying a franchise?

choices.answer: Access to a successful business idea

questions.question: Which of the following is a benefit of writing a business plan?

choices.answer: You choose what you want to do

questions.question: What benefit does limited liability give an entrepreneur?
Which of the following is a reason for doing market research?

choices.answer: Find out how much customers might be prepared to pay
Discover the cheapest way of making a product
Find out how much to pay workers

questions.question: Which of the following statements is true?

choices.answer: e-commerce is usually more expensive than opening a shop
Higher prices will always lead to higher demand
Secondary research is often quite quick and cheap to obtain

questions.question: One advantage of using a wholesaler is:

choices.answer: They break bulk and sell smaller quantities to retailers
They offer their services free of charge
A producer doesn't need to advertise when using wholesalers

questions.question: Which of the following is true?

choices.answer: Place means how a good is transported to consumers
Promotion is always free of charge
Publicity is a form of free promotion

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a source of capital for a business?
Which of the following is a disadvantage of taking out a bank loan?

choices.answer: It always has to be repaid quickly
Revenue of the business will be reduced

questions.question: Which of the following is an advantage of trade credit?

choices.answer: It never has to be paid back
The interest rate is quite low
It's like "free" finance for the credit period given

questions.question: Which of the following is a benefit of using cash flow forecasts?

choices.answer: They forecast the profit a business is going to make
They record how much cash a business actually has
They give a prediction of possible future cash flow problems

questions.question: The monthly net cash flow for a business could be increased by which of the following?
Which of the following is a commonly used source of business advice about sources of finance?
A business could make higher profits by doing which of the following?

choices.answer: Increasing costs by more than revenue
Increasing revenue by more than costs

questions.question: One advantage of employing full-time rather than part-time staff is:

choices.answer: More flexibility over when staff work  during the week
Staff are often more motivated with full-time work
There will be fewer fringe benefits with full-time workers

questions.question: Which of the following is a disadvantage of using external recruitment to fill a vacancy?

choices.answer: There is less choice of people to recruit from
Existing workers have little chance for promotion

questions.question: Which of the following is a benefit of increasing production efficiency?
Improving quality is a benefit to a business because of which of the following?
Which of the following statements is NOT part of consumer protection laws?

choices.answer: Goods must be fit for purpose
Employees have to make sure they are acting in a safe way
Goods must be of satisfactory quality
